author: djd
msg: Cleanup jdbcapi.ProcedureTest to use utility methods and not use usingDerbyNet in its suite() method. Add a utility method to JDBC to drain a result set and assert it contained at least one row.

author: fuankg
msg: added winsock imports for WS2 builds.

author: aconway
msg: - Replaced InProcessBroker with BrokerFixture, uses a full loopback
- Extracted non-generated parts of Session_0_10 into SessionBase.
- in process broker with loopback connections.
- tests can force a disorderly disconnect.
- back door to private members for BrokerFixture.
- close() in destructor to avoid leaks.
- close() in destructor, to fix hang when destroyed without being closed.
- Extracted all non-generated code from Session_0_10 into SessionBase

author: fuankg
msg: fixed include path to use forward slash.
